critique: The document is an approval of a Code of Fair Competition for the Cast Iron Pressure Pipe Industry. The tone is formal and legalistic. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is joy that the National Industrial Recovery Act is being implemented and that the industry is complying with the provisions of the Act. There is also an element of surprise that the application was made in full compliance with the provisions of the Act. There is no indication of sadness, anger, fear, or disgust.
